page.title: 03Field Study-near Faversham
page.content: On Friday{classes four and six went for a walk in the country. We went about 10 O'Clock. We all took a pack lunch,I brought an apple,polos some sandwiches and a nice drink and two more things-two packets of crisps. We went over lots of{stiles,}at first it was difficult to get over with our bags but we got over in the end. We went through some{fields of sheep}and there were lots of droppings there so we had to watch where we were going. Some of us saw a{dead mole}and a{field {mouse}and I saw a{rabbit.}We had to find some little yellow squares of paper but I never found one. We went by{barns}and{woods}and lots of other things. We walked about{6 kms.}and my legs were aching. After about 5 hours time we were at school and we all went home for a rest. {Alison Pepler
